resources.string: A tech enthusiast. Feels proud of creating stuffs. Apparently pursuing career as a Mobile Application Developer. Believes in her infinite potential.
• Practicing martial arts! \n• Thoughts of starting healthy diet while having stuffed pizza! \n• The calmness of people getting used to dhaka traffic!
Number API: Search digits like 89,1000, 30432423 etc. \nDate API: Search month and date in the format \"mm/dd\" like for 31st December \"12/31\".
Load the content on a mobile browser from the device?

This app uses two free APIs. Currently the home showing Top US News and Top Techchrunch News fetched from \"newsapi.org\" \nSearch page uses \"numbersapi.com\" for date and number search. \nThis application is a sample recruitment project task.
